Flat Roof Services

Expert flat roof repairs, replacements, and maintenance to ensure lasting waterproof protection.

Call (403) 470-8666

Services

Repairs and Maintenance

  • Flat Roof Repairs / Maintenance
    We repair all types of flat roof systems and offer scheduled maintenance to prevent costly leaks and extend roof lifespan.
  • Flat BUR Roof Repair / Maintenance
    Our team restores built-up roofs with high-quality membranes and coatings, sealing cracks and blisters for long-lasting performance.
  • Flat Roof Pressure Washing / Maintenance
    Professional cleaning removes debris and moss buildup that can trap water and cause drainage issues.
  • Flat Roof Drain Maintenance
    We clear and inspect roof drains to keep water flowing freely, preventing pooling and water intrusion.
  • Residential Flat Roof Drain Repair / Maintenance
    We repair or replace failing drain components on residential flat roofs to prevent standing water and leakage.

Specialized Flat Roof Work

  • Flat Roof Ice Dam Repair / Maintenance
    Ice dams can cause serious winter leaks. We remove ice buildup safely and improve insulation and drainage to prevent recurrence.
  • Flat Roof Skylight Curb Installation
    Proper skylight curbs protect your flat roof from water entry — we build and seal them to professional standards.
  • Flat Roof Leak Investigation
    Using moisture detection and visual inspection, we locate the source of flat roof leaks quickly and recommend targeted repairs.
